channel.title: [PI] InsidiaX Spawning
channel.description: I downloaded an InsidiaX based server and when ever i die and spawn it puts me right outside jads cave... I went into config.java and looked at the spawn cords and they where my home is set to... Any help?

item.title: [PI] InsidiaX Spawning
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

go to playerassistant.java and search for

u will see in this method something like.

Change the rights to 0

now search for

you sill see 2 coords the x coords and the y coords
change them to this

c.teleportToX = Config.RESPAWN_X; c.teleportToY = Config.RESPAWN_Y;
then search for

replace that method with this one

if (c.inFightCaves()) { c.getPA().resetTzhaar(); }

Read full topic
